data.system_settings: iPhone 6S, iOS 10.3.3 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11 Golden Master
data.actual_result: Nothing will be shown below the category.
data.expected_result: The user who is in a voice channel will be displayed with his user profile like it is for the Desktop version (a user withouth username should be shown below the category in the first picture like it is at the Desktop version).
data.short_description: Collapsed category with voice channel won't show other users who are in a voice channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a category with at least one voice channel - Make sure that any other member joined a voice channel in this category - Make sure that you aren't in a voice channel - Collapse the category - Observe the category
